item.title: Changing to Hugo and Netlify
item.description: The internet has changed a lot since I was first dabbling at 11 years old. I’m now using Hugo and Netlify. Customisations I’ve made: Changed title to SVG and updated colour Modified the overal width Updated to Google fonts, and amended sizes and line-heights Created ‘in brief’ and ‘in depth’ tags Display these tags as post metadata on the main list, with custom colour Update formatting for post entries based on the tag Changed some other list behaviours, e.
